contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you are interested in my profile, drop me a message!

about.title: Hi!
about.name: My name is Agustina Lopez
about.paragraph2: I'm always eager to learn, and my social skills enhance team communication and collaboration.
about.paragraph3: Outside of coding and design, I'm an actress, which has enhanced my creativity and communication skills. I also enjoy playing tennis and taking walks to stay inspired.
